Html:
Thanks for sharing this excellent piece of work. However, as a newbie I do have some very brief questions before starting to use it. Maybe I have missed this info, then please accept my apologizes.

  1. Will the Google Maps support eventually be removed or just be marked as deprecated? I have read http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/discussions/252531 , did I miss something?
  2. What will happen with this 3D bird's eye support, I have found some info it is in demo state, will this be continued or stopped because of 1.

nothing will be removed ever, thats for sure

and birds eye wasn't implemented, but maybe it will ;}
